item.title: Has NLC India Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, NLC India Ltd. has declared a dividend of 36%, amounting to ₹1.5 per share, with an ex-date of January 16, 2026. The company has demonstrated strong total returns over various periods, with a total return of 398.09% over the past five years. Time: 26 minutes ago

item.title: Has Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. has declared a dividend of 1100%, amounting to ₹11 per share, with an ex-date of January 16, 2026. While the dividend yield is 3.92%, total returns over various periods have been mixed, showing negative returns in most periods except for the last 5 years, which yielded a positive total return of 10.12%. Time: 26 minutes ago

item.title: Has Tembo Global Industries Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Tembo Global Industries Ltd has declared a dividend of 10% (1 per share) with an ex-date of January 16, 2026. The company has demonstrated strong total returns over longer periods, particularly in the 3 to 5-year ranges, despite some volatility in shorter time frames. Time: 26 minutes ago

item.title: Has HCL Technologies Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: HCL Technologies Ltd has declared a dividend of 600% (₹12 per share) with an ex-date of January 16, 2026. The company has shown strong total returns over various periods, particularly with 68.36% over three years and 86.93% over five years. Time: 26 minutes ago
